pages.text: When The Heart dies, our community comes together to bring her back.$(br2)This comes in the form of a Fundraiser Event! You will have 2 weeks to raise the necessary materials (chosen semi-randomly at the time of the event) to revive The Heart.

We often offer a 'stretch goal' which, if reached, will upgrade The Heart's capabilities in some way- either increasing her output or providing better safeguards against future demise.$(br2)$(l:patchouli:the_economy)Back to The Economy$(/l)$(br2)Shift click the arrow at the bottom to return to the main page!
